item.title: projects page
item.description: I’ll be slow getting started here. But note that I added a projects page, pointing to my current) and a few of my old projects.

item.title: new website
item.description: I’m working on a new project (a low-cost CO2 monitor), which inspired me to create a new website. My old website is now pretty old (last post 2014-01-14), and I just don’t want to touch Wordpress anymore. But I feel inspired to get back into it, so why not start fresh?
